mapper.insert: insert into board values(null, #{writerNo }, #{title }, #{content }, now(), 0, (select max(group_no)+1 from board b), 1, 0, 'on')
mapper.update: update board set order_no = order_no+1 where order_no > #{orderNo } and group_no = #{groupNo }
mapper.select: select b.no, user_no writerNo, title, content, u.name writer, date_format(write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') writeDate, hit, group_no, order_no, depth, status from board b join user u on (b.user_no = u.no) order by group_no desc, order_no

select b.no, user_no writerNo, title, content, u.name writer, date_format(write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') writeDate, hit, group_no groupNo, order_no orderNo, depth, status from board b join user u on (b.user_no = u.no) where b.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update board set status = 'off' where no = #{no }
update board set title = #{title }, content = #{content }, write_date = now() where no = #{no }
mapper.select: select no, board_no boardNo, url, ori_name oriName, change_name changeName, path, size from file where board_no = #{value }
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where no = #{no }
